name: Doppelganger
description: A pale, featureless figure with large, unsettling eyes and a smooth, almost gelatinous body.
memorable: Masters of deception, able to mimic voices and memories.
goals: Infiltrate societies to gather information, steal, or cause chaos.
relations: Often works alone or in small groups; manipulates others.
environment: Typically found in urban settings or anywhere it can blend in.
strengths: High dexterity and charisma, excelling in stealth and deception.
weaknesses: Average physical strength and low constitution.
attacks: Uses a powerful Precise Strike for melee damage, especially against surprised foes.
most_powerful_ability: Shapeshift allows it to transform into any Small or Medium humanoid it has observed.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Highly skilled in deception, insight, and stealth, enabling it to outmaneuver adversaries.
additional_information: Can read thoughts, gaining advantage on checks against the target.
Advantage on attack rolls against surprised creatures.
Retains statistics in both shapeshifted and original forms.
Most effective when used strategically in social situations.
test_queries: pale figure that can mimic other humanoids
creature that reads thoughts and transforms
